body: Goblins' traditional weapons are the dogslicer and the horsechopper, weapons designed specifically to bring down their most hated foes. Goblins with this trait are proficient with the dogslicer and the horsechopper, and treat any weapon with the word "goblin" in it as martial weapons. This racial trait replaces skilled.
name: Weapon Familiarity
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Goblins/Alternate Racial Traits/Weapon Familiarity
